channel.title: rabbitmq on Jiang Jun Jie's Site
channel.description: Recent content in rabbitmq on Jiang Jun Jie's Site

item.title: Docker RabbitMQ
item.description: start rabbitmq 3.8.14 and management plugin in docker docker-compose.yml version: '3.1' services: rabbitmq: image: rabbitmq:3.8.14-management ports: - 15672:15672 - 5672:5672 restart: always environment: RABBITMQ_DEFAULT_USER: {username} RABBITMQ_DEFAULT_PASS: {password}
